original_title: Seeing for Ourselves: Women Working in Film
overview: Profile of four independent women filmmakers: Joanna Davis, Tina Keane, Annabel Nicolson and Lis Rhodes, who are shown at work with Felicity Sparrow of Circles, the Women's distribution group which they helped to found. They relate the struggle for a new cinema to the wider aims of the women's movement.
title: Seeing for Ourselves: Women Working in Film
